oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Alice Josephine Hopper Allen, 1970
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white headshot style photograph of Alice Josephine as an older woman, taken in about 1970 in California. She wears a white blouse against a dark background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen, Alice Josephine Hopper, 1914-1990
Portrait photographs; African Americans; Women; African Americans--Women
California
